Title: Chapter One: 'Tis the Season
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (teleplay by), Michael Connelly (teleplay by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: An LAPD homicide detective works to solve the murder of a 13-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer. Based on Michael Connelly's best-selling book series, 'Bosch'.
